word:
ELDER WHITE: MY PERSONAL INTEREST, AS FAR AS SENDING CHILDREN TO SCHOOL, HAS ENTIRELY PASSED NOW. I HAVE NO THOUGHT OF SENDING MY CHILDREN HERE. I 


                                    -366- 

DON'T EXPECT TO. BUT IN THE INTERESTS OF TRUTH, IN THE INTERESTS OF PRINCIPLE, AND IN THE INTERESTS OF A GOOD UNDERSTANDING OF WHERE WE ARE AT, AND HOW WE ARE TO TREAT OTHER PEOPLE'S CHILDREN, I AM JUST AS MUCH INTERESTED AS I HAVE EVER BEEN.
